00018     void HcalVetoProcessor::configure(const ParameterSet& pSet) {

00020     }
00021 
00022     void HcalVetoProcessor::produce(Event& event) {
00023 
00024         // Get the collection of sim particles from the event 
00025         const TClonesArray *hcalHits = event.getCollection("hcalDigis");
00026         //if (hcalHits->GetEntriesFast() == 0) return; 
00027        
00028         // Loop over all of the Hcal hits and calculate to total photoelectrons
00029         // in the event.
00030         double totalPe{0}; 
00031         for (int iHit = 0; iHit < hcalHits->GetEntriesFast(); ++iHit) { 
00032             HcalHit* hcalHit = (HcalHit*) hcalHits->At(iHit);
00033             //std::cout << "[ HcalVeto ]: Hit PE: " << hcalHit->getPE() << std::endl;
00034             totalPe += hcalHit->getPE(); 
00035         }
00036 
00037         bool passesVeto{true}; 
00038         //std::cout << "[ HcalVeto ]: total PE: " << totalPe << std::endl;
00039         if (totalPe >= totalPEThreshold_) passesVeto = false;
00040         
00041         result_.setResult(passesVeto); 
00042         event.addToCollection("HcalVeto", result_);
00043     }
00044 }
